Summary: in 1999 i saw a sphere of light over my house.
divs: Sighting Details i saw this thing flying over my house against thewind, it looked like a silver ball, changeing its shape as it flew over, i videotaped it while it movee about, it seemed to notice m and stoped crusing and juststopped over the house, at this point more apeared out of no where some semedtodrop out of the first one i saw i video taped the whole episode and cleared upone shot thru adobe photo shop ill attach the shot to this letter please contactme and i wil give you more info involving theu.s. govt, and alien tech beingdeveloped at the im, time they jpl, and others told me to quit sending outletters and contacting others about this matter but i feel, well FUCK THEM...anyway let me know
